title.narrative: Creating Hope in Conflict: A Humanitarian Grand Challenge

description.narrative: Our goal is to find and accelerate life-saving or life-improving innovations to help the most vulnerable and hardest-to-reach people impacted by humanitarian crises caused by conflict. Creating Hope in Conflict: A Humanitarian Grand Challenge, is a partnership of the U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID), the U.K. Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office (FCDO), the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands, Global Affairs Canada, with support from Grand Challenges Canada.

participating-org.narrative: Canada - Global Affairs Canada | Affaires mondiales Canada
United States Agency for International Development (USAID)

sector.narrative: The innovations supported by HGC cover four broad focus areas: 1) WASH; 2) Life-saving Information; 3) Energy; 4) Health Supplies and Services.
The innovations supported by HGC cover four broad focus areas: 1) WASH; 2) Life-saving Information; 3) Energy; 4) Health Supplies and Services.
